channel.title: samba, or another way for filesharing over network?
channel.description: Can I install samba to whonix workstation? or something like that will allow me to share files between 2 virtual machines (over another network that only these 2 virtual machines are connected to). (host shouldnt see the content)

item.title: samba, or another way for filesharing over network?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
For sharing of files see (most likely shared folder):

Whonix

File Transfer

Copying files into and out of Whonix ™ Virtual Machines.

bcdg:

Can I install samba to whonix workstation?

Most likely yes but doing so is undocumented, therefore unsupported.

bcdg:

I think bigger issue, whonix workstation doesnt get ip address from 2nd network adapter

I don’t understand. It’s a static IP address.

By following instructions from https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Multiple_Whonix-Workstation you’ll end up with different internal IP addresses.

bcdg:

If everything is blocked, then what is the usage of this lol. its almost just like “Tails”

There are no artificial user freedom restrictions. It’s not Windows. It’s not Android with locked bootloader and no way to unlock. Every modification should be possible but unfortunately instructions for every advanced modification cannot be provided.

You probably have to reconfigure Whonix-Workstation firewall.

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Install_Software#Whonix-Workstation_.E2.84.A2_is_Firewalled
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix-Workstation_Firewall

Or - crude - unload Whonix-Workstation firewall.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Firewall_Unload

Read full topic
